Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: 2019-10-12-vue-v-xxx Vue v-xxx
Post._content:
> **** > **** `vue``vue` - **[](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/)** - **[](https://github.com/xkloveme/vue-v-xxx/)** ## vue? **** - ,`Vue` ### 1. ```js v-text v-html v-show v-if v-else v-for v-bind v-on v-model v-once ``` > [](https://cn.vuejs.org/v2/guide/conditional.html), ### ? > DOM . ```js // // directives: { focus: { // inserted: function (el) { el.focus() } } } ``` ### () * `bind` * `inserted` () * `update` VNode ** VNode ** * `componentUpdated` VNode ** VNode** * `unbind` ### * `el` DOM * `binding` * `name` `v-` * `value``v-my-directive="1 + 1"` `2` * `oldValue` `update` `componentUpdated` * `expression` `v-my-directive="1 + 1"` `"1 + 1"` * `arg` `v-my-directive:foo` `"foo"` * `modifiers``v-my-directive.foo.bar` `{ foo: true, bar: true }` * `vnode`Vue * `oldVnode` `update` `componentUpdated` ## vue-v-xxx? **** > vue,, ### - npm , `npm` `webpack` ```bash # install vue-v-xxx npm install vue-v-xxx --save # or yarn add vue-v-xxx --save ``` - unpkg.com/vue-v-xxx js css ```html ``` ### - `main.js`,[](https://github.com/xkloveme/vue-v-xxx-project) ```js import Vue from 'vue' import App from './App' import Vxxx from 'vue-v-xxx' import 'vue-v-xxx/lib/vue-v-xxx.css' Vue.config.productionTip = false Vue.use(Vxxx) /* eslint-disable no-new */ new Vue({ el: '#app', components: { App }, template: '' }) ``` - CDN vue-v-xxx [](https://codesandbox.io/s/vue-v-xxx-bndj4) ```html vue-v-xxx

{{ value }}

``` ## ? **** ### v-call > - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-call.html) - ``` ``` ### v-copy > - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-copy.html) - ``` ``` ### v-debounce > `v-debounce` `v-debounce:500` 500ms - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-debounce.html) ``` ``` ### v-throttle > `v-throttle` `v-throttle:2000` 2s - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-throttle.html) ``` ``` ### v-ellipsis > `v-ellipsis` ,`v-ellipsis` - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-ellipsis.html) ``` ``` ### v-pin > `v-pin` `v-pin:left || top` left - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-pin.html) ``` ``` ### v-focus > `v-focus` - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-focus.html) ``` ``` ### v-click-out > `v-click-out` dom - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-click-out.html) ``` ``` ## > **issue,,,** ## `star` - [GitHub](https://github.com/xkloveme/vue-v-xxx/) - [blog](https://www.cnblogs.com/xkloveme/)

{{ value }}

``` ## ? **** ### v-call > - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-call.html) - ``` ``` ### v-copy > - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-copy.html) - ``` ``` ### v-debounce > `v-debounce` `v-debounce:500` 500ms - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-debounce.html) ``` ``` ### v-throttle > `v-throttle` `v-throttle:2000` 2s - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-throttle.html) ``` ``` ### v-ellipsis > `v-ellipsis` ,`v-ellipsis` - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-ellipsis.html) ``` ``` ### v-pin > `v-pin` `v-pin:left || top` left - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-pin.html) ``` ``` ### v-focus > `v-focus` - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-focus.html) ``` ``` ### v-click-out > `v-click-out` dom - [](https://www.jixiaokang.com/vue-v-xxx/configurations/v-click-out.html) ``` ``` ## > **issue,,,** ## `star` - [GitHub](https://github.com/xkloveme/vue-v-xxx/) - [blog](https://www.cnblogs.com/xkloveme/)
Post.content:
vuevue

vue?

  • ,Vue

1. 

v-text  v-html  v-show  v-if  v-else v-for  v-bind  v-on 
v-model  v-once

,

?

DOM .

<input  v-focus>// 

// 
directives: { 
  focus: { 
  //  
  inserted: function (el) { 
    el.focus() 
    } 
  } 
}

()

  • bind

  • inserted ()

  • update VNode VNode

  • componentUpdated VNode VNode

  • unbind

  • el DOM

  • binding

    • name v-
    • valuev-my-directive="1 + 1" 2
    • oldValue update componentUpdated
    • expression v-my-directive="1 + 1" "1 + 1"
    • arg v-my-directive:foo "foo"
    • modifiersv-my-directive.foo.bar { foo: true, bar: true }

  • vnodeVue

  • oldVnode update componentUpdated

vue-v-xxx?

vue,,

  • npm , npm webpack 

# install vue-v-xxx

 npm install vue-v-xxx --save

# or

 yarn add vue-v-xxx --save
  • unpkg.com/vue-v-xxx js css 

<!--  -->

<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/vue-v-xxx/lib/vue-v-xxx.css" />

<!--  -->

<script src="https://unpkg.com/vue-v-xxx"></script>

  • main.js,

import Vue from vue

import App from ./App

import Vxxx from vue-v-xxx

import vue-v-xxx/lib/vue-v-xxx.css

Vue.config.productionTip = false

Vue.use(Vxxx)

/* eslint-disable no-new */

new Vue({

el: #app,

components: { App },

template:

})

-  CDN  vue-v-xxx [](https://codesandbox.io/s/vue-v-xxx-bndj4)
```html

<!DOCTYPE html>

<html>

  <head>

    <meta charset="utf-8" />

    <title>vue-v-xxx</title>

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/vue-v-xxx/lib/vue-v-xxx.css" />

  </head>

  <body>

    <div id="app">

      <h1 title="Welcome"> {{ value }}</h1>

      <button v-copy="value">Click me!</button>

    </div>

  </body>

  <!-- import Vue before vue-v-xxx -->

  <script src="https://unpkg.com/vue/dist/vue.js"></script>

  <!-- import JavaScript -->

  <script src="https://unpkg.com/vue-v-xxx/lib/vue-v-xxx.umd.js"></script>

  <script>

    new Vue({

      el: '#app',

      data: {

        value: 'vue-v-xxx'

      }

    })

  </script>

</html>

?

v-call 

  • <template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
div(v-call="tel") 
div(v-call:sms="10086") 
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'v-call',
  data() {
    return {
      tel: '10086'
    }
  }
}
</script>

v-copy 

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  Button(@click="handleClick" v-copy="value") 
  div
    textarea(placeholder="Paste here" style="margin-top:40px;width:100%;height:100%;")
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: 'v-copy',
    data() {
      return {
        value: ''
      }
    },
    methods: {
      handleClick(html = ',') {
        this.value = html
      }
    }
  }
</script>

v-debounce

v-debounce v-debounce:500 500ms

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  h1 
  h2 :{{num}}
  Button(@click="addNum") ()
  h1 
  h2 :{{num2}}
  Button(v-debounce="addNum2") ()
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'v-debounce',
  data () {
    return {
      num: 0,
      num2: 0,
    }
  },
  methods: {
    addNum () {
      this.num++
    },
    addNum2 () {
      this.num2++
    }
  }
}
</script>

v-throttle

v-throttle v-throttle:2000 2s

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  h3 :{{num}}
  input(v-model="num")
  h3 :{{num2}}
  input(v-throttle:2000="num2")
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: 'v-throttle',
    data() {
      return {
        num: '',
        num2: ''
      }
    }
  }
</script>

v-ellipsis

v-ellipsis ,v-ellipsis

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  div(v-ellipsis) {{des}}
  div(v-ellipsis:3)
    p {{des2}}
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'v-ellipsis',
  data() {
    return {
      des:
        '',
      des2:
        ''
    }
  }
}
</script>

v-pin

v-pin v-pin:left || top left

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  div(v-pin="200") 200px
  div(v-pin:left="300") 300px
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: 'v-pin'
  }
</script>

v-focus

v-focus 

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  input(v-focus)
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'v-focus'
}
</script>

v-click-out

v-click-out dom 

<template lang="pug">
.v-xxx
  div(style="border:1px solid red;width:200px;height:200px;" @click="handleClick" v-click-out="handleClickOut") {{name}}
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: 'v-click-out',
    data() {
      return {
        name: ''
      }
    },
    methods: {
      handleClick() {
        this.name = ''
      },
      handleClickOut() {
        this.name = ''
      }
    }
  }
</script>

issue,,,

  • GitHub
  • blog

Post.title: UI
Post._content:
# 

> 
> 


## 

 **,,,.,,.,?UI?,,[hekr-ui](https://hy.hekr.me/hk-ui/web/index.html),UI**

- [](https://hy.hekr.me/hk-ui/web/index.html)
- [](https://github.com/xkloveme/hk-ui)

## 

> `Vue``element-ui`UI

-  `Vuepress` ,
-  `gitlab CI` , `travis` 
- `vue-cli 3.0``pug``sass`()

## 

1. `npm`
2. 
3. 
4. 

# 

## 

### 1.

> [`Vue CLI`](https://cli.vuejs.org/zh/guide/creating-a-project.html#vue-create) 

![.jpg](https://s2.ax1x.com/2019/10/10/uThubn.jpg)

```bash
vue create hekr-ui
```



### 2.

> `git`

- 

```bash
echo "# hekr-ui" >> README.md
git init
git add README.md
git commit -m "first commit"
git remote add origin https://github.com/xkloveme/hekr-ui.git
git push -u origin master
```

- 

```bash
git remote add origin https://github.com/xkloveme/hekr-ui.git
git push -u origin master
```

.`node_modules`

## 

### 1.

> `yarn`,`npm`OK

`vuepress`,,,,`demo`

```bash
#  VuePress 
yarn add -D vuepress # npm install -D vuepress

#  docs 
mkdir docs

#  markdown 
echo '# Hello VuePress!' > docs/README.md

# 
npx vuepress dev docs
```

 `package.json` :

```json
{
  "scripts": {
    "docs:dev": "vuepress dev docs",
    "docs:build": "vuepress build docs"
  }
}
```

:

```bash
yarn docs:dev # npm run docs:dev
```

 HTML 

```bash
yarn docs:build # npm run docs:build
```

,

```bash
// 
yarn add *** 
// ,npm
yarn
```

`dependencies``devDependencies`

1. `--save`  `dependencies`
2. `--save-dev`  `devDependencies`

### 2.

- `vuepress`,

```docs
.
 docs
    .vuepress ()
       components ()
       theme ()
          Layout.vue
       public ()
       styles ()
          index.styl
          palette.styl

}

2.  `.travis.yml` :

```yml
language: node_js
node_js:
  - '8'

install:
  - npm install

script:
  - npm run build

after_success:
  - cd ./docs/.vuepress/dist
  - git init
  - git config --global user.name "${U_NAME}"
  - git config --global user.email "${U_EMAIL}"
  - git add .
  - git commit -m "Automatically update from travis-ci "
  - git push --quiet --force  "https://${GH_TOKEN}@${GH_REF}" master:${P_BRANCH}

branches:
  only:
    - master

notifications:
  email:
    - xkloveme@163.com
  on_failure: always

# Note: you should set Environment Variables here or 'Settings' on travis-ci.org
env:
  global:
    # travis-ci
    - U_NAME: xkloveme
    - U_EMAIL: xkloveme@qq.com
    - P_BRANCH: gh-pages
    - GH_REF: github.com/xkloveme/vue-v-xxx.git
```

# 

## 

> `hk-button`,

1. 

```vue
<template lang="pug">
el-tooltip(effect="dark" v-if="tips" :content="tips" placement="top-start")
  el-button.hk-button(:size="size" :type="type" v-bind="$attrs" @click="handleClick")
    slot
el-button.hk-button(:size="size" v-else :type="type" v-bind="$attrs" @click="handleClick")
  slot
</template>

<script>
import { Debounce } from './../util/debounce'
export default {
  name: 'hk-button',
  props: {
    type: {
      type: String,
      default: 'primary'
    },
    size: {
      type: String,
      default: 'medium'
    },
    tips: {
      type: String,
      default: null
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleClick: Debounce(function (e) {
      this.$emit('click', e)
    }, 200)
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
.hk-button {
  i + span {
    padding-left: 10px;
  }
}
</style>

```
2. 

```js
import HkButton from './hk-button'

export default HkButton
```
3. `install`

```js
/*
 * @describe: ,install
 * @Author: superDragon
 * @Date: 2019-10-09 23:21:11
 * @LastEditors: superDragon
 * @LastEditTime: 2019-10-10 19:09:57
 */
import HkButton from './hk-button'
import HKcard from './hk-card'

const install = Vue => {
  Vue.component(HkButton.name, HkButton)
  Vue.component(HKcard.name, HKcard)
}

if (typeof window !== 'undefined' && window.Vue) {
  install(window.Vue)
}

export {
  HkButton,
  HKcard
}

export default { install }

```

  2. .travis.yml :

language: node_js
node_js:
  - '8'

install:
  - npm install

script:
  - npm run build

after_success:
  - cd ./docs/.vuepress/dist
  - git init
  - git config --global user.name "${U_NAME}"
  - git config --global user.email "${U_EMAIL}"
  - git add .
  - git commit -m "Automatically update from travis-ci "
  - git push --quiet --force  "https://${GH_TOKEN}@${GH_REF}" master:${P_BRANCH}

branches:
  only:
    - master

notifications:
  email:
    - xkloveme@163.com
  on_failure: always

# Note: you should set Environment Variables here or 'Settings' on travis-ci.org
env:
  global:
    # travis-ci
    - U_NAME: xkloveme
    - U_EMAIL: xkloveme@qq.com
    - P_BRANCH: gh-pages
    - GH_REF: github.com/xkloveme/vue-v-xxx.git

  2. vuepress

hk-button,

<template lang="pug">
el-tooltip(effect="dark" v-if="tips" :content="tips" placement="top-start")
  el-button.hk-button(:size="size" :type="type" v-bind="$attrs" @click="handleClick")
    slot
el-button.hk-button(:size="size" v-else :type="type" v-bind="$attrs" @click="handleClick")
  slot
</template>

<script>
import { Debounce } from './../util/debounce'
export default {
  name: 'hk-button',
  props: {
    type: {
      type: String,
      default: 'primary'
    },
    size: {
      type: String,
      default: 'medium'
    },
    tips: {
      type: String,
      default: null
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleClick: Debounce(function (e) {
      this.$emit('click', e)
    }, 200)
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
.hk-button {
  i + span {
    padding-left: 10px;
  }
}
</style>

import HkButton from './hk-button'

export default HkButton
  1. install
/*
 * @describe: ,install
 * @Author: superDragon
 * @Date: 2019-10-09 23:21:11
 * @LastEditors: superDragon
 * @LastEditTime: 2019-10-10 19:09:57
 */
import HkButton from './hk-button'
import HKcard from './hk-card'

const install = Vue => {
  Vue.component(HkButton.name, HkButton)
  Vue.component(HKcard.name, HKcard)
}

if (typeof window !== 'undefined' && window.Vue) {
  install(window.Vue)
}

export {
  HkButton,
  HKcard
}

export default { install }
